Entries.AcceptGift_(O)StardropTea: Mmm, that really hits the spot. What's it made of? Slime?
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)746: A new pet? I don't know, I'm not very good at taking care of living things.#$b#I'll give it to Deathskull, he'll like having an audience for his bone jokes.
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)909: Hey, it's my favorite thing! Perfect for rubbing all over my sores.
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)910: Hey, it's my favorite thing! Perfect for rubbing all over my sores.
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)749: You know, these things have lotsa cool stuff in them.
Entries.AcceptBirthdayGift_Positive: Hey, how'd you figure out what day I rose from the grave?
Entries.rainy: Ahh, this weather makes me feel nice and slimy.
Entries.Mon: They call me Blob because I blob up and down.
Entries.Tue: Ahh I love the scent of toxic waste in the morning.
Entries.Wed: What I would give for a damp cave to moisten up in.
Entries.Thu: My cousin Angry Roger told me you humans like to wash grime off your skin rather than keep it on.#$e#He's joking, right?
Entries.Fri: That building on the docks smells marvelously putrid.#$e#What do they keep in there?
Entries.Sat: It's so windy up here on the surface.#$e#My mucus layer keeps drying out!
Entries.Sun: Ugh, Doug splashed some soapy water on me and now I feel CLEAN.#$e#I'll never get this citrus smell out of my glands.
